Name: Trump Card
Effect: Single Target. If the User's Will points are at half or less, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool. If the User's Will points are depleted, add 8 Extra Dice to the Damage pool of this Move instead.
Description: The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pok√©mon is on the last of its strength, this move can be devastating.
